lines.text: It's all your fault, it's you who wanted to die for France.
Yes, but I didn't want to be shot by Frenchmen, I wanted to be shot by Germans.
He says can he hurry up and shoot us, the pubs close in ten minutes.
A reasonable enough request, I suppose.
Let me out of here, I'm too young to die.
Nonsense, you're just the right age. Don't you agree, Colonel?
